title: Pictures of Jewish Home-Life Fifty Years Ago
creator: Hannah Trager
description: LibriVox recording of Pictures of Jewish Home-Life Fifty Years Ago, by Hannah Trager. Read by Arielle Lipshaw. Hannah Trager published Pictures of Jewish Home-Life Fifty Years Ago in 1926, so the book is a portrait of day to day life for a Jewish family in Jerusalem around 1876. In each chapter, Mr. Jacobs reads a letter from his cousins living in Jerusalem many years earlier, each one teaching his family and friends about a different holiday or tradition of their people. (Introduction by wildemoose) For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org. M4B format available
subject: librivox; audiobook; religion; jewry; jews; trager
source: Librivox recording of a public-domain text
